group.description: Name of the notification holder, if specified.

width.description: Width of notification holder, can be %, px string or number.

classes.description: List of classes that will be applied to notification element.

position.description: Part of the screen where notifications will pop out.

animation-type.description: Type of animation, currently supported types are css and velocity.

animation-name.description: Animation name required for css animation.

speed.description: Time (in ms) to show / hide notifications.

duration.description: Time (in ms) to keep the notification on screen (if negative - notification will stay forever or until clicked).

ignore-duplicates.description: Ignore repeated instances of the same notification.
